scripts.build: tsc && vite build && tsc -p main/tsconfig.json && tsc -p main/tsconfig.preload.json
scripts.electron:dev: npx tsc -p main/tsconfig.json && npx tsc -p main/tsconfig.preload.json && concurrently "npm run dev" "wait-on http-get://localhost:5173 && cross-env VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 electron ."
scripts.predist: npm run generate-icons && npm run validate-icons
scripts.dist: npm run predist && tsc && vite build && tsc -p main/tsconfig.json && tsc -p main/tsconfig.preload.json && electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.js
scripts.build:alpha: cross-env BUILD_PROFILE=alpha npm run predist && cross-env BUILD_PROFILE=alpha tsc && cross-env BUILD_PROFILE=alpha vite build && cross-env BUILD_PROFILE=alpha tsc -p main/tsconfig.json && cross-env BUILD_PROFILE=alpha tsc -p main/tsconfig.preload.json && cross-env BUILD_PROFILE=alpha electron-builder build --config electron-builder.config.js --publish never --config.nsis.oneClick=false
scripts.build:prod: cross-env BUILD_PROFILE=production CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false WIN_CSC_LINK= npm run predist && cross-env BUILD_PROFILE=production vite build && cross-env BUILD_PROFILE=production tsc -p main/tsconfig.json && cross-env BUILD_PROFILE=production tsc -p main/tsconfig.preload.json && cross-env BUILD_PROFILE=production CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false WIN_CSC_LINK= electron-builder build --config electron-builder.config.js --publish never --config.nsis.oneClick=false
